channel.title: TrinityX OldschoolPk Take a LOOK!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i816.photobucket.com/albums/zz81/xxpl0xrangexx/prooftopost.jpg[/img]
Theres my proof to post. Thats from my Old DevelopMent Team but no-one wanted to join so... I'm starting a new one hoping for some recruits.
Well first off I am hoping for a Oldschool Server with no customs AT ALL. The only Modern Thing added will be Godsword Stance. I am sure most people are familiar with the amazing work of CrisisX, QuadraX and R.I.P Near Reality. Well thats what I'm aiming at. Here what I plan to complete:
[b]Features[/b]
- Mage Bow, Crystal Bow [Oldschool] - Few Descent Minigames [Castle Wars,PestControl,Assualt] - Stable Economy - Hard Earnin' Cash - Descent Xp Rate, [Does 1-2,000 Xp Per Hit Sound Fair?] - Alot More so Help US out!!!!
I dont care much for a formal Application. I just want to know about you, Years of EXP, How long a day you can work and how many days a week. Umm and You're EMAIL.
Also to talk to me In-game and to make a App on here [Optional] Login to:: Trinity-x.no-ip.info with Khanz 562 ip changer.

@pl0x15 wrote:

Alright heres the positions ill add into the post in a sec

Main Owner and CODER- L2pk Void (me)
Co Owner and Coder- Open
Admin and Forum Maker- Open
Admin and Client Coder- Open
Trainee Coder and Mod- PkerA
Trainee Coder and Mod- Open
Trainee Coder and Mod- Open

Also the trainee coders are the ones with not the “Most” experience (no offence) and they are helped by main coders such as me. PkerA if you accept you’re spot as Trainee i will help you with some coding procedures as we create this project

A.K.A----You’re Accepted.

Theres my proof to post. Thats from my Old DevelopMent Team but no-one wanted to join so… I’m starting a new one hoping for some recruits.

Well first off I am hoping for a Oldschool Server with no customs AT ALL. The only Modern Thing added will be Godsword Stance. I am sure most people are familiar with the amazing work of CrisisX, QuadraX and R.I.P Near Reality. Well thats what I’m aiming at. Here what I plan to complete:
